alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 7:20PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Palm Beach County through 745 PM EDT... At 720 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dunes Road to Kings Point. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boca Raton, Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Highland Beach, Ocean Ridge, Village Of Golf, Kings Point, Dunes Road, Whisper Walk, Gulf Stream, Briny Breezes, Manalapan, Fau South Campus, Boca West, Morikami Park and Villages Of Oriole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
